    • About Joao Mucciolo


    Joao has been an entrepreneur since 2003 in Nicaragua, bringing the Sushi Itto franchise to the country and creating his own brand: Italianissimo. He created a company of 6 restaurants and more than 120 direct jobs.

    Brazilian by birth, and traveler of the world, Joao landed in Nicaragua more than 20 years ago and considers himself today as Nica! He speaks Spanish, English, Portuguese, and a little French.

    Joao has contributed to entrepreneurship in Nicaragua, bringing organizations such as the Entrepreneurs Organization and Accelerator with the purpose of helping entrepreneurship grow. He is also a member of the Central American Leadership Initiative of the Aspen Institute where he strengthens his leadership skills.
